comment.author: 78084606@N00
comment._content: This seems to be staged.  The trench is in better condition than they often were, with a neat set of duckboards on which to walk.  The men have their heads above the parapet, which would be highly dangerous usually.  The uniforms are quite neat, in the circumstances.  Not quite what it appears at first glance.

comment.author: 78084606@N00
comment._content: As a point of interest, there is a trench periscope visible, just under the metal bar across the trench top.  This would be a safer way of keeping lookout!
